markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Oil](/Traits.aspx?ID=663)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup>

Oils are magical gels, ointments, pastes, or salves that are typically applied to an object and are used up in the process.
name: Oil
